parameters.name: Environment Variables
parameters.description:
Environment variables in key=value format, one per line. Each line sets an environment variable in the container configuration. Example:
MYAPP_HOST=localhost
MYAPP_PORT=8080
DATABASE_URL=postgresql://localhost:5432/mydb
